actions.text: Notwithstanding the passage of H.R. 5895 and the adoption of amendment SA 2910 to H.R. 5895, the instruction line for amendment SA 2920 is modified by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2920 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 131.

Amendment SA 2920 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4021-4022; text: CR S4021) To direct the Secretary of the Army to submit a report on the status of returning to non-Federal project sponsors excess non-Federal funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2920 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 131.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2920 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 131.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2920 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2910.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To direct the Secretary of the Army to submit a report on the status of returning to non-Federal project sponsors excess non-Federal funds.
